title: Privilege
beginning: Take 1 gold
end: Draw 1

title: Strong-arm the hostage
beginning: Attack the least powerful dungeon scheme
end: Attack the next least powerful dungeon scheme

title: Disguise as a peasant
beginning: If this is the least powerful scheme in play, revive 1
end: Draw as many as the least powerful scheme in play has time

title: Found a charity
beginning: If you have 5 or less gold, take 5 gold
end: Take 1 gold for each less powerful scheme in play

title: Hire a mercenary
beginning: Attack the least powerful green scheme in play
end: Attack the least powerful yellow scheme in play

title: Revolutionize court fashion
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 1
end: Draw as many as the left timeline scheme has time

title: Give your daughter in marriage
beginning: If the left 2 timeline schemes are the same color, take their total time in gold
end: If they are different colors, draw the lower time

title: Entrap the Chamberlain
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is green, attack it
end: If the left timeline scheme is yellow, attack it

title: Advocate reform
beginning: Draw until you have 5 schemes in hand
end: Appoint 1 Privilege from the bank

title: Receive prophesy
beginning: Look at your top deck scheme, then put it back
end: Put 1 scheme from your hand face down on your deck

title: Become the Sheriff
beginning: If you have 5 or less plots in hand, take 1 Privilege from the bank
end: Draw as many as the highest power dungeon plot has time

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If your top discard scheme has a lower power, take it in gold
end: Appoint your top discard scheme

title: Stir up the peasants
beginning: Attack the Privilege in the bank
end: If there is a Privilege in play, attack it

title: Give fealty
beginning: Pay the left timeline scheme's time in gold
end: Draw that many

title: Steal from the rich and give to the poor
beginning: Take 1 gold for each scheme in play with more power
end: Pay 1 gold

title: Rob the wretched
beginning: Attack the lowest power dungeon scheme
end: Take its time in gold

title: Impersonate a foreign Countess
beginning: Revive the highest time in the dungeon
end: Draw the highest time in play other than this

title: Confiscate estates
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, take it's time in gold
end: Take 1 gold for each dungeon scheme

title: Kidnap the Judge
beginning: Attack the highest power dungeon scheme
end: Take 1 gold

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: Revive 1 for each green timeline scheme
end: If the left timeline scheme is green, draw 1

title: Court the Duchess
beginning: Pay the left timeline scheme's time in gold
end: Take its power in gold

title: Jailbreak
beginning: Attack the highest power green dungeon scheme
end: Attack the highest power yellow dungeon scheme

title: Bribe the Judge
beginning: Pay 1 gold
end: Draw 1 for each green dungeon scheme

title: Declare bankruptcy
beginning: Look through your deck and take 1 gold for yellow scheme
end: Appoint your entire deck

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
beginning: Attack your top discard scheme
end: Revive 1

title: Reclaim your rights
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 2
end: Draw 1 for each green timeline scheme

title: Steal the diamond
beginning: If your deck or discard is empty, take 5 gold
end: Otherwise, appoint your entire hand

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: Attack the lowest time yellow scheme in play
end: Attack the lowest power yellow dungeon scheme

title: Mask the Crown Princess
beginning: Appoint your top discard scheme until it is green or empty
end: Revive your entire discard

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, take its power in gold
end: Put your top discard scheme face down on your deck

title: Start a riot
beginning: Attack the lowest power timeline scheme next to a green scheme
end: If your top discard scheme is yellow, appoint it

title: Invest a Bishop
beginning: Take 30 gold for each scheme in play power 30 or above
end: Draw until you have 10 schemes in hand

title: Takeover the guilds
beginning: Take 1 gold for each lower power yellow plot
end: Take the lowest power in play in gold

title: Torture the spymaster
beginning: Attack the highest power green dungeon scheme
end: Draw as many as it has time

title: Excommunicate the Cardinal
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, appoint it
end: If one of the left two timeline schemes are green, but not both, draw 2

title: Embezzle funds
beginning: Take 1 gold for each yellow dungeon scheme
end: Take the lowest dungeon power in gold

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: Attack the lowest time time scheme in play
end: If it has less power, attack it again

title: Secretly author plays
beginning: Revive 1 for each green scheme in play
end: Draw 1 for each green scheme in the timeline

title: Hold a market fair
beginning: Take 1 gold for each timeline scheme of the left color
end: Take 1 gold for each timeline scheme of the right color

title: Plunder the treasury
beginning: Attack the highest power yellow scheme in play
end: Attack the highest power yellow dungeon scheme

title: Move the capital
beginning: Revive 1
end: If your top discard scheme is green, draw 3

title: Collect taxes
beginning: Take 1 gold for each scheme in play with 10 or less power
end: Take 1 gold for each dungeon scheme with 10 or less power

title: Organize a mutiny
beginning: Attack the green scheme in play with the most power
end: Attack it again

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: Pay 30 gold
end: Revive until you have 10 schemes in hand

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: Take the highest dungeon power in gold
end: Take your top discard scheme's power in gold

title: Declare martial law
beginning: Attack the yellow scheme in play with the most power
end: Attack the left timeline scheme

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is green, pay 1 gold
end: Draw your entire deck

title: Issue bonds
beginning: Take the right timeline scheme's power in gold
end: If there is a red scheme in play, pay 10 gold

title: Streetfight
beginning: Attack your top discard scheme
end: Take 10 times its time in gold

title: Become the Queen of Thieves
beginning: Revive 1 for each dungeon scheme
end: Draw 1 for each dungeon scheme

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Take your top discard scheme's power in gold
end: If it is green, appoint it

title: Declare independence
beginning: Take 10 times as much gold as you have
end: Attack the highest power scheme in play other than this
